posts.post_content:
Posted By: Marty
I am making my entire inventory availible for a 10% discount of listed prices.  This will include all pre war and post war.  This includes over 1500 graded cards and over 7500 raw cards.  Everything on my web site [URL="http://www.oldvintagebaseballcards.com"]ALL MARTY'S STUFF/OLD VINTAGE BASEBALL CARDS[/URL] is included.  To receive this discount, enter NET54-10% in the coupon code box at check out.  I accept credit cards, PayPal and mailed payments.  The only restrictions are $25.00 minimum purchase required and the dates are December 30 through January 1 2009.
